Resource Profile: TW Continuous Prescription MedicationDispense

Official URL: https://prescription.cgh.org.tw/StructureDefinition/MedicationDispense-tw-ContinuousPrescription Version: 0.1.0
Active as of 2023-07-24 Computable Name: TWContinuousPrescriptionMedicationDispense

此臺灣慢性連續處方之給藥紀錄(TW Continuous Prescription MedicationDispense) Profile說明本IG如何進一步定義FHIR的MedicationDispense Resource以呈現台灣慢性連續處方的詳細資料 [FMM1]

Usage:

  • Examples for this Resource Profile: MedicationDispense/MedicationDispense-Create-FirstFill-20230815, MedicationDispense/MedicationDispense-Create-Refill-20230815 and MedicationDispense/MedicationDispense-Create-RefillComplete-20230815

Formal Views of Profile Content

Description of Profiles, Differentials, Snapshots and how the different presentations work.

  • Key Elements Table
  • Snapshot Table
  • Statistics/References
  • All

MedicationDispense 0..*MedicationDispense依據為病人或實體集合（例如：特定的一群人）開立的藥品處方所發給之藥物

additionalInstruction 0..*CodeableConceptTW對病人的補充指示或警告－例如：「隨餐服用」，「可能引起嗜睡」
Binding: SNOMEDCTAdditionalDosageInstructions (example): 一個編碼的概念，確定額外的指示，如「與水一起服用」或「避免操作重型機器」；可參考SNOMEDCTAdditionalDosageInstructions代碼表，但此代碼表只是針對這個欄位的一個可能值的示例，不預期也不鼓勵使用者一定要使用此代碼表的代碼。

Binding: UnitsOfTime (required): 時間的單位（單位來自UCUM）；應填入UnitsOfTime代碼表中的其中一個代碼
